ruleBookInfo.author: [property="og:novel:author"]@content

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(!cache.get("ua2")){   
	h=JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/microlinkhq/top-user-agents/master/src/desktop.json"))
java.log(h.length)
x =Math.floor(Math.random() *h.length)
java.log(h[x])	
cache.put("ua2", h[x],86400);
    	}
//!(/google.cn/).test(baseUrl)?h=java.getString("id.acontent@html"):h=decodeURIComponent(baseUrl.replace(/^.*?text=/, ''));
url = baseUrl.replace("www.bilinovel.com","tw.linovelib.com")
//re = java.ajax(baseUrl)
//re = java.ajax(url)
//h = java.webView(null,url,null);
//java.setContent(re); 
h = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
//java.log(h)
java.setContent(h)

h=java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children").not("[data-ad-client]").not("script")//Clear ads
//END
if(0){//jump old codes

original_list = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children")

java.setContent(h)
h = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children");
//java.log(h[4])
//java.log(h.length)
if(h.length!=original_list.length){//there is repeat item
	

//replace to correct text
function confident(str1, str2){
	if(str1.length!=str2.length){
		return false; 
		}
		if(str1.length==0){
			return true;
			}
		confidence =0;
		target = Math.max(1,Math.floor(str1.length/2));
	for(let i=0;i<str1.length;i++){
		if(str1[i]==str2[i]){
			confidence++;
			if(confidence>=target){
				return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
k=0
for(let i=0;i<original_list.length;i++){
if(k>=h.length){
break;
}
ele = original_list[i]
str = String(java.getString("text",ele));
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log(str)
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(str.length)
//java.log(strcom.length)
while(k<h.length&&!confident(str,strcom)){
k++
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log("x")
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(strcom.length)
}

if(k<h.length){
if(java.getString("tag.script@all",ele)!= ""){
original_list[i] = h[0]
}else{
original_list[i] = h[k]
}
}

k++
}
h = original_list
}//close repeat item
else
{
	h = java.getString("tag.body@tag.div.5@html")
	}
//run readtools.js match words
//run js file's last line
//jsLink = java.getString("tag.script@src").match(new RegExp("https.+readtools.+", "gi"))[0];
//h=String(h);
//code = String(java.ajax(jsLink)).trim().split("\n").pop().trim().split(";")[1];
}//end of old code
h
</js>

if(!cache.get("ua2")){   
	h=JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/microlinkhq/top-user-agents/master/src/desktop.json"))
java.log(h.length)
x =Math.floor(Math.random() *h.length)
java.log(h[x])	
cache.put("ua2", h[x],86400);
    	}else{java.log(cache.get("ua2"))}

</js>
